name: Catapult Siege
description:
A simple game for my first game jam.

The game is simple enough charge up your shot and release to fire, hit objects and get more distance to increase your score.

You can put your name on the leader board and clear the leader board in the pause menu by following the instructions.

If there are any bugs let me know, I tested and tried to break it for a while and found no issues.

Controls:

X - "Action"

C - "Menu"
